content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, it's nice to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment in Mannheim. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What are you looking to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Is that possible?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. However, as a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible price for my property. It's important to consider the value of the apartment and the expenses that come with it, such as maintenance and utilities, when determining the rental price. That being said, I am open to negotiating and finding a mutually beneficial agreement. What price range are you looking to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay up to 1000 Euros per month. Is that possible?
TERMINATE
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, I understand your budget, but it may not be possible to rent the apartment for 1000 Euros per month. The rental price will depend on various factors such as the location, size, and quality of the apartment, as well as the current market conditions. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you further and provide you with a more accurate estimate. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
